entry.title: growing towards you
entry.summary:
Author: kryptonian

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,700Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 0

Summary: He doesn’t pay them much mind, though, his attention focused intently on Eddie—there’s an unreadable expression on his face. That doesn’t happen often. Buck’s spent years learning the language of Eddie Diaz, becoming fluent in every single look and expression Eddie could throw at him.He doesn’t know this one.“You like tulips?” Buck asks.Eddie almost jumps out of his skin, startled—apparently so deep in thought he’d forgotten Buck was next to him. “Sure. Uh—They’re nice.”Eddie’s cheeks flush a soft pink, his hands tightening on the handles of the reusable fabric bags as he shrugs a shoulder, attempting to take another step to continue on their travels through the market.Buck ignores the instinct telling him to let it go, like he often does.ORFlufftober day 20: Tulips

entry.title: Some People Search Forever
entry.summary:
Author: facewithoutheart

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,829Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 6

Summary: When Eddie learns he and Buck got drunk-married at Chimney’s bachelor party, he goes on a metaphorical journey to figure out the best way to be a good husband. “Now you get it. Damage done. We didn’t know,” Buck shrugs, “now we do, so we can just …”Eddie’s mind races to finish Buck’s sentence:Park our cars side-by-side in my driveway forever.Hang all our clothes in the same closet so I have better access to that blue hoodie I love.Kiss.“… get an annulment.”“What?” The word slips out of Eddie’s mouth before he can stop it.Buck frowns.“You want to …” Eddie drops his fork to his plate. He’s suddenly not hungry, despite how much he loves Buck’s omelets. His voice wobbles when he adds, “You don’t want to be married to me?”

entry.title: Off the Record
entry.summary:
Author: ScribblesAfterDark

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 26,843Chapters: 17/?Kudos: 38

Summary: As the guys started heading back onto the field, Eddie lagged behind. Part of him wanted to head back out. Throw a few more. Work on his accuracy. But, Coach had said to ice his shoulder, and he followed rules to the letter…at least on the field. When he rounded the corner toward the small athletic training room, the cool air from inside hit him like a wave…and there he was. Evan Buckley, officially part of the athletic training staff, unofficially Eddie Diaz’s favorite member of the training staff. Buck was a Sophomore, one of the student trainers assigned to baseball. He’d said something once about studying sports medicine, wanting to work with pro athletes someday. He didn’t act intimidated by the players like some of the other trainers did…didn’t treat Eddie like some kind of celebrity. It was…refreshing. Eddie hadn’t meant to notice him every time he came in…honestly, he tried not to…but something about the way Buck moved, calm and confident, made it hard to look away. Or, Eddie Díaz has the perfect life laid out for him: star pitcher, bright future, endless expectations. Off the field, though, it starts to crack when he’s drawn to Buck…the one person who refuses to play along.

entry.title: Station 118
entry.summary:
Author: Eduardoeririk

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,997Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 3

Summary: Firefighter Eddie Diaz didn’t understand why his heart was beating so fast or why he couldn’t stop thinking about Evan Buckley. The man who caught his attention on his first day at his new station 118, and later became his closest friend. Of course, it was because they were best friends. He was straight. He had a son and was still married — even though his wife had left him two years ago.

entry.title: Columba
entry.summary:
Author: KilldevilandtheWildThings

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 158,600Chapters: 28/28Kudos: 254

Summary: Buck held the little plastic bird close in front of his eyes, twisting it back and forth. “You can say it, Buck,” Eddie encouraged, quietly. “To put it out there in… the universe. And you’ll see her tomorrow, anyway.” “I think…” Buck took a huge breath, breathing deep into his chest, past the hurt, past the hard rock of anxiety that sat at its center, past the tears welling in his eyes; he aimed all of it back out, straight into the heart of the deep, deep universe. “I think I met my daughter tonight.”   or; A work of fate or God or man or the universe crosses the paths of Buck and a small, green-eyed girl with a bird in her palm and the future in her snaggle-toothed grin. Two and a half years after the events of Lighthouse, the Diazes become the Diazes.

entry.title: What A Lovely Way To Burn
entry.summary:
Author: penpen_xo

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,586Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 40

Summary: Eddie moved to sit on the arm of the couch and despite Bucks attempts to swat his hand away, settled the back of it on Buck's forehead regardless. Buck found himself sighing into the touch in spite of himself, his eyes fluttering closed again as he leant into the strong, calloused hands that he knew so well, despite how cool they felt against his skin. He found himself shivering into them. “You’re hot.” Eddie murmured. “You’re hot.” he retorted in his head instantly, because how else do you respond to your hot boyfriend when he leaves himself so open? “What?” “What?” Buck's voice felt a little louder, more present and he’s not sure now if he said the previous thing in his head or not. He opened his eyes to see Eddie’s worried face, and Buck wanted to reach up and soothe out the dip in his eyebrows. “You have a fever Buck.”   or   Buck has a fever and is taken care of. That’s it, that’s the fic.

entry.title: The Boy Next Door
entry.summary:
Author: buddiesongfic

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,344Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 9

Summary: Buck smiles, almost too warm. “God, you're handsome, you know that?” Eddie chuckled, even though a flicker of discomfort ran through him. “Handsome, loyal, great, sexy…” Buck’s voice trailed, soft but deliberate. Eddie stood up, reaching for his jacket, letting out a huffing laugh at the last word. But when he turned around… Buck was already close. “So sexy…” Buck hushed, his face just inches from Eddie’s. The words were soft, intimate, but the gaze—locked, lingering—made Eddie freeze. OR; the literal (Maybe not) story of the movie The Boy Next Door

entry.title: self-destructive tendencies (and other love languages)
entry.summary:
Author: madforyou

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 13,549Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 84

Summary: “Pretty sure you appointed me taste tester, and I haven’t even gotten to taste a single—” That’s as far as he gets. Eddie moves before Buck can blink—one smooth, unhesitating motion. His hands find Buck’s waist first, then slide lower, bracing under his thighs as he lifts. The world tilts, and for a second Buck feels weightless, the heat of Eddie’s palms searing through denim, the strength behind it dizzying against Buck’s already crumbling composure. Then the counter meets him—cool beneath his thighs even through the fabric—Eddie’s hands leaving heat in their wake like a brand. Eddie’s still standing close enough that Buck’s knees frame him, not backing away immediately. His breath grazes Buck’s chest, eyes flicking up, the space between them charged with something that makes every cell in Buck’s body scream more, more, more. “Now sit,” Eddie says firmly, hands still resting under Buck’s legs before he finally backs away. “Stay.” Or,Eddie picks Buck up, Buck is totally cool and normal about the whole thing.

entry.title: Happier Than Ever
entry.summary:
Author: stonyismyotp

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 43,737Chapters: 12/?Kudos: 276

Summary: "It’s Dr. Wells. The Dr. Wells Bobby had sent Buck to, over a year and a half ago. The same one he couldn’t quite admit had taken advantage of him, had made him feel numb whenever he tried sharing his feelings, who made it impossible to open up to any other therapist— She was there and she had a baby. A baby who couldn’t be more than ten months old. A baby with his blonde hair and bright blue eyes, not her dark hair and dark eyes." or Dr. Wells had a baby & never told Buck. - title from the song by billie eilish pls heed the tags, & i'll be putting warnings at the beginning of each chapter, this is going to be a relatively heavy fic (tho it will be focused on recovery) so pls prioritize your own mental health.

entry.title: S2 Superwoman: Last Responder
entry.summary:
Author: That_bitch_without_a_life

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 20,191Chapters: 5/12Kudos: 59

Summary: “I know we haven’t been having that best of luck with partners for you yet, but I think today could really go well Buck.” Bobby says, catching her in between jobs. “Let me guess, I’m meeting him tomorrow whether I like it or not and it’s going to take us less than an hour to realise he’s a misogynist.” “Oh, are we better on Buck’s new work partner again, I bet he doesn’t even last through the first call with her.” Chimney says, Kleenex bottle in hand. “That’s rude Chim, I’ve run the maths and the average is at least two calls, give him that.” Kara responds much to Bobby’s charging. “How about you both give the new guy a chance, he’s fully fresh.” “Wait! Cap you’re giving me a Probie.” TLDR: this is a female buck fic if she was supergirl, just trust the process.

entry.title: feel it again (something new)
entry.summary:
Author: rizcriz

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,918Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 243

Summary: “It was almost you,” He finds himself saying, eyes still closed, mind caught on a frozen image. A still frame of Eddie’s eyes on him, a line of blood running between his eyes.He hears Eddie’s surprised inhale and turns his head lazily, blinking at him. Watching the weight of the words sink into him.Eddie frowns, shuffling to turn towards him fully. “What?”The corners of Buck’s mouth rise, wry and bittersweet and trembling. “You were standing next to him,” he offers, voice cracking. “It was almost you.” He pauses, turns his gaze back to the ceiling and exhales slowly. “Again.”Eddie goes still, body tensed and frozen, and Buck closes his eyes again.--Or, the call with the space debris triggers the memory of Eddie getting shot.

entry.title: Testing the Edges (With You)
entry.summary:
Author: Princessfbi

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 26,736Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 80

Summary: “Wait a minute!” Chimney cried out, waving his hand in front of him. “You know this place too?”  “Uh…” Buck cocked his head. His blue eyes flicked to Eddie before falling back to the others. “Yeah. I meet Eddie for drinks sometimes after his shift.” As if Eddie had ever let him have a drink that didn’t come out of his own glass when he was feeling generous. But Eddie wasn’t about to tell their team that most of those meet ups involved Buck on his knees for him either.  aka Buck decides to act like a brat and the 118 receives a call to the kink club
